string.text: It's good to see you again, Raven. Let's talk business...

Hello to you, Marked One. I've heard the Bandits have found a hiding place full of weapons in the Dark Valley. The interesting thing is that they're all from the late 19th and early 20th centuries. Can you believe that? They must have been buried there long before both World Wars... A couple of Duty members came to see Artyom for a snack, and told him all about it a few days ago! Well, I have this client, a collector of sorts from outside the Perimeter, and who visits the Zone from time to time... If I could get my hands on some of those rare beauties, I'd make a fortune! Look, if you find any interesting or Unique weapons during your travels, come and see me and we'll do business, okay? No questions asked, and I'd certainly make it worth your while!
A rare HK-417 sniper rifle... Are you interested?
Here's an interesting piece, with a scope too... What do you think?
This custom AK-74 belonged to 'Strelok'... It'd be a shame to sell it, though...
Can I interest you in a customized Abakan Sniper?
A brand new Fort-14 pistol... How about it?
How about an MP-5 rechambered for 9x18mm cartridges?
I can offer you this 'Groza' combat rifle...
How does a Spas-12 sound to you?
I could probably part with this Winchester...
I have a very nice L85 Enfield combat rifle here, if you want it...
How about an L300 'Sniper'... This one's very rare!
I've a nice SVD 'Dragunov' here if you want...
This SIG550 combat rifle... a really powerful piece! You interested?
I've got a nice Desert Eagle Mark XIX for you...
A true assassin's piece - a silenced Colt 1911. Any use to you?
A nicely made AS Val 'Shaft' with a scope attached. Yours if you want it...
How about a silenced MP-5?
I've got a very nice Abakan 'Assault' model... Interested?
How about a 'reduced weight' Enfield L85 combat rifle?
This 'Anomalous' AK-74U might interest you...
A camouflaged SIG 'Sniper'. Any good to you?
A quite powerful modified G-36 'Crystal'. Interested?
I reckon this customized SVU 'Kid' will interest you...
How does a Beretta M9A1 sound to you?
Check out this special VSS Vintorez. Yours for the asking...
A nicely customized OC-14 'Groza', re-chambered for NATO cartridges... Interested?
I've got a lovely RG-6 that fires NATO rounds... What do you think?
How about a Walther, customized for 9x18mm rounds?
I've got this nicely customized Makarov PM available...
Can I interest you in an RPG-7?
I've got a 'Knights' SR25 Mk.11 Mod 0. Very hard to find! Interested?
I managed to get my hands on this Unique FAMAS... You interested?
I've a customized Gauss rifle... How about it?
What about a sawn-off shotgun?
I found this pistol... Any use to you?
Here's a Stechkin. I thought you might like it...
I managed to lay my hands on this HK-XM8 'Para'. You should have it...
How about an FN-2000 'Executioner'? It's a nice weapon!
Certainly, Marked One. My client will be pleased. Here's your payment...
Well done, Marked One! This is superb! Thank you...
Sounds good. I'll take it...
Yes, I will take the Abakan...
Quite a good pistol. Thank you. I'll take it...
Thank you, Marked One!.
Always a pleasure to do business with you. Here...
This is certainly a nice piece!
This is most excellent. I'll take it!
Thank you for this wonderful weapon!
Sniper rifles are my greatest weakness! Thank you!
Good work, my friend... I'll take it!
A very nice SIG indeed... Thank you!
A nicely made Desert Eagle - I will certainly take that off your hands...
I'm always interested in silenced weapons, for sure...
An excellent AS Val 'Shaft'. You have a deal...
Good find! I'll take it...
You know me well! How could I resist such an item?
A nicely customized weapon... Thank you!
It's a bit worn, but I'll take it...
Camouflaged, huh? Sounds good...
I'll gladly take that G36 'Crystal' off your hands...
Where did you find such a Unique weapon?! I'll take it!
A nice, powerful Beretta. Thank you...
I'll never refuse a VSS... It's a good weapon...
A nice customized 'Groza', eh? Hand it over...
How could I refuse a 'Bulldog'? Thank you...
Yes, very rare indeed! I'll take it...
A classic piece! Yes, please!
This is excellent, Marked One. Much appreciated!
I'll take the sniper rifle...
Thank you, Marked One!
Nice Gauss rifle. I'll take it...
This is wonderful. Thank you very much!
Not a bad weapon at all! Pass it over!
I'm always interested in Stechkin pistols...
Sounds good to me. You've got yourself a deal...
That's a nice piece of kit. I'll take it...
Nothing yet, sorry...
Do you sell weapons and ammunition?

I have a varied assortment of weapons available, and a small selection of ammunition...\nHowever, the people I work for are not short of cash. They insist that I deal only in mutant body parts, understood? So shall we talk business?
What sort of ammo do you have?
Let's have a look at those weapons...

I can offer you the following:
 
Shotgun shells in exchange for Pseudodog tails
9x39mm cartridges in exchange for Blind Dog tails
I'll take the shotgun shells...
I'll take the 9x39mm cartridges...

Here's what I have available:
 
Submachine guns in exchange for Burer hands
A Desert Eagle, an M4A1, or shotguns in exchange for Controller hands
Let's see the submachine guns...
I'll have a look at the others...

Five Pseudodog tails will get you either:
 
Three packs of 12x70 buckshot
Two packs of 12x70 slugs
One pack of 12x70 darts...
 
Which will it be?
I'll take the 12x70 buckshot...
Give me the 12x70 slugs...
I think I'll take the 12x70 darts...

Ten Blind dog tails will get you either:
 
Four packs of 9x39mm 'PAB9' cartridges
Three packs of 9x39mm 'SP5' cartridges
Two packs of 9x39mm 'AP' cartridges...
 
Which ones do you want?
I'll take the 'PAB9' cartridges...
I'll take the 'SP5' sniper rounds...
I'll take the 'AP' rounds...

For four Burer hands, I can offer you one of these:
 
A Bizon
A Kriss Super-V
An MP-7a3
 
What will it be?
I'll take the 'Bizon' off your hands...
I'll try the 'Kriss Super-V'...
The 'MP-7a3' sounds good...

Two Controller hands will get you one of these:
 
A TOZ-34
An M4A1 'Taktikal'
A Saiga-12K
A Desert Eagle
A BM-16 'Scattergun'
 
The choice is yours...
Give me the TOZ-34...
I'll take the M4A1...
I've been looking for a Saiga 12K...
I'll take the Desert Eagle...
The sawn-off BM-16 please...
Nah, I've changed my mind...
I don't have them right now... Maybe later...
I'm looking for some ammunition, and hopefully some better armor...
Well, I sell Flamethrower mixture, armor, and ammunition too...\nWhat exactly are you looking for?
I need some Flamethrower mixture...
Let's see the armor, and the ammunition...

I can offer you either of these:
 
Flamethrower mixture for twelve bottles of vodka
A full gasoline canister, or a Colloidal gas canister, for five bottles of vodka...
I'll take the Flamethrower mixture...
Let's see the gas canisters...

For ten bottles of vodka, I can offer you:
 
A choice of armored suits...
Ammunition for the 'Groza' combat rifle...
I need some better armor...
Let's see the ammunition...

So we're in agreement then:
 
For twelve bottles of vodka I can give you the Flamethrower ammo...
How does that sound?
Yes, I'll take the Flamethrower mixture...

For five bottles of vodka, I can offer you:
 
A Colloidal gas canister
A full gasoline canister
 
Take your pick...
I'll take the Colloidal gas...
Give me the gasoline canister...

Ten bottles of vodka will get you either of the following:
 
A 'Guardian of Freedom' suit
Duty PSZ-9MD armor
 
What will it be?
I'll take the 'Guardian of Freedom' suit...
Give me the Duty PSZ-9MD armor...

Ten bottles of vodka will get you either of these:
 
Three packs of 9x39mm 'PAB9'
Two packs of 9x39mm 'AP'
 
What'll it be?
Give me the 9x39mm 'AP' rounds...
I'll take the 9x39mm 'PAB9'...
I've changed my mind...
Nothing for now. Maybe later...
Hello, what brings you back here?
Well, Stalker. Did you find Krysjuk? Or at least his PDA?
Unfortunately no. Krysjuk the Rat is dead, and I didn't find his PDA...
Hmm, it's a pity about the PDA, but before he ran off Krysjuk was friends with Vein... Would you like another job?
Vein, you say? Sure, I'll go and find him...
Greetings, Vein. I need information on Krysjuk's last whereabouts...
Krysjuk? Yes, I heard about him. What do you need?
I need your help to find something he left behind...
What do you mean?
In short, Borov wants Rat's PDA, but we didn't find it on his body. Where can we find it?
Ah, I heard it contains the locations of all Borov's caches. How about I share this info with you, if you do something for me?
And if I refuse, you won't help me?
It depends on you...
You can refuse if you like, but it won't help you. Rat's PDA is in a very secret place...
I need you to get me a very special weapon. In the Bar there's a guy called Hunter. I want his rifle. How you get it is up to you...
Okay, I'll talk to Hunter, but I can't promise anything...
But you will talk to him?
Yes, I promise...
I talked with Hunter, and told him how much you admire his rifle. He's agreed to part with it in exchange for some beer...
Beer? Sure, I'll get it. How many does he want?
Forty cans. He needs it to last him a while...
Fine, I'll work out the coordinates of Rat's cache in Cordon, if you find the beer for me. Try Sidorovich or someone nearby. I'll give you the PDA in return for the weapon...
Greetings, Hunter! I have an interesting request from one of the bandits...
You deal with bandits?
I have my reasons, but one of them wants to buy your weapon from you. What would it take to part you from it?

Well, it's been with me a long time but, to be honest, I no longer use it. We change and move on, don't we? I'll swap it for twenty cans of beer. No, let's make him work for it, then he'll appreciate it more. Forty cans...
Beer? Well, that's not easy to find in the Zone, but I'll see what I can do...
Hi, Hunter!
Hey, no need to shout, man! Keep the noise down. My head hurts... What do you want?
I've brought a hair of the dog for you. Forty of them...
Beer? What beer? Hey, I'm joking... Everything's fine...
Are you sure you said forty? Maybe I should just leave you twenty?
Sure, I'm drunk anyway!
Thanks for the beer. And here's my pride and joy...
Take it and leave, and to hell with the bandit...
Here's your rifle. Okay?
Thank you brother! A deal well done!
And what about my share?

Your share awaits you in Agroprom... Here, I have a gift for you.\nHow to create a 'Medusa' from different stuff... Just throw a Tushkano's head, a bandage, a sausage, and a can of meat into an Electro...
Thanks, I'll check it out...
Hello, Borov. I found where Rat had hidden your PDA...
Where? Do you have it?
What about my share?
I have your share. Give it to me first!
Here's your PDA...

Here's your key to the underground. There's also a good cache waiting for you at the north of the Army Warehouses, near the fallen helicopter...\nAnd as a bonus, here's how to make a Quirk, by thowing a bandage, a can of mat, a sausage, and the head of a Tushkano into a Fruit Punch anomaly...

To the north of Army warehouses, near the fallen helicopter...\nAnd here's a way to make a Quirk, by throwing a aandage, a Tushkano's head, a sausage, and a tin of canned meat into a Fruit Punch anomaly...
Thank you!
Greetings, Seriy! How are you doing?
Well, Bandits attacked the Bar recently, and stole most of the ammo in stock. Then two days later all our PDAs got disconnected from the network... Fuck knows why...
Well, if it's of any use, I have a box of cartridges for you...
Thanks! What do you want for it?
How about a zinc box?
Deal! Here you go...
Thanks, and good luck!
How are you doing? Do you need any ammo?
Hello, brother! Yes, we're always running out of ammo...
It's really heavy. Are you sure?
Yes, I'm sure! What do you want for them?
For the whole box of cartridges, how about twenty medkits? Does that sound right with you?
Yes. Excellent. Thank you!
No, it's okay, I don't need them...
Hi, Lukash! Do you need ammo? I have a box of cartridges with me...
Hello, Marked One. I'm very glad that you've brought them to us...
They're very heavy. Are you sure?
Yes, of course. What do you want for them?
For the whole box, thirty Antirads... Is that okay with you?
Yes, that's fine. Thank you...
No, I'm okay, thanks...
Greetings, Wolf! Good to see you again!

Greetings, Marked One. I'm checking the area in case of an attack on the Bar, but our radios don't pick up all the transmissions from Cordon. Can you find Fanatic for me? He's has a decent radio receiver...
Sure, I'll find him...
No, I'm sure Fanatic has already sent a messenger...
Hey, Wolf! I found Fanatic...
Did you get a radio from him?
I've got the portable radio set here... Fanatic was wounded by mercenaries, so he sent messengers...
Thank you, Marked One! And here's a tip for you...\nIf you want a Ruby Battery, just throw a normal Battery into an Electro...
Hey, Fanatic! Have you sent a radio receiver or a messenger to Wolf? He's waiting for you!
Forgive me, Marked One. I did send a few men, but they didn't complete the journey. And one of them dropped the receiver somewhere in the Dump...
Shit! Where is it?
Somewhere behind the hangar. There's a trench there with an unfinished water pipe...
Hey, Screw! How are the teleports?...
Hi, Marked One! I have the teleportion data for Yantar...
Excellent! What would you need in return?...
Oh, I don't need anything, except maybe maybe a blonde! Here, take it... Get yourself over to Sakharov and back. He promised me a new copy of Playboy!
Sure...
Do you have the Playboy?
Yes, this one's specially for you...
Thank you, Marked One. God, I'd forgotten what women looked like!
Well, this should definitely help you remember...
Let me know whenever you need to get to Yantar...
Hello, Professor...
Hello, Marked One. How's life?..
Do you have any Playboy magazines?
The Zone must be getting to you, Marked One! Here's a Playboy from 2006. Have fun...
Greetings, Screw. I need to teleport to Yantar...
Have you used this before?
No, I haven't...
Well, I need a Mica artefact to work it. But I don't have one. Do you?
Yes, I have one...
No, I sold it...
I don't have one, but I'm happy to take on some work to get one...
How much will it cost?
If you have money, then 9,000...\nAnd if not - 2,500 will be fine. Okay?...
Let's try...
I'm not loaded, but 2,500 sounds like a good deal...
I can't do that, sorry. I'll walk, thanks...
Thank you. The teleport gateway is opposite the front entrance of the base. Just continue down the road and you will see it...
Thank you. The teleport gateway is opposite the front entrance of the base. Just continue down the road and you will see it...
Hi. Why the sad face?

Greetings, Marked One... I'm starting to miss some of Life's little pleasures that are difficult to get in the Zone... Beer, for example... I hear that you can get beer In the Dark Valley. Will you bring me some? Get me at least 10 bottles, and I'll give you something useful for them, namely a Recipe for an artefact I got from Yurek's PDA...
That's not a bad idea. I'll get some for myself, too. In the Dark Valley, you say? Okay...
Sorry, but I'm not going anywhere near those bandits...
Greetings, Dan! Hey, I've got your beer...
Well, Marked One, you just made my day! You want to drink?
Sure. Here you are, fresh and unopened...
Excellent beer, and it is fresh! I'll send the recipe to your PDA...\nListen, Marked One... Is it possible to ask you for something else?
Just tell me what you need. I travel around a lot, and I might be going that way...

Well... At the Dump is a guy called Raven. I may have mentioned him before. I've ordered a BM-16 sawn-off shotgun from him, and in exchange I have a bag for him. Will you deliver it, and pick up my shotgun? I promise you a unique artefact for your trouble...
Raven? No problem, give me the bag. And it's no trouble...
Sorry, but I'm not going that way... Better ask someone else...
Greetings, Dan! I brought your shotgun...
Excellent work! Thank you...
No problem. Here's your weapon. What kind of artefact do you have?

Thanks, Marked One! About the artefact, I don't have it on me, but I know exactly where it is. In the north of the Forgotten Forest you'll see some red barrels near a transition. I think they're still full of fuel. That's where you'll find the 'Emerald Medusa'. Just watch out for mutants in the area...
I will, and thanks for the warning...
Hi, Raven... I brought you this bag from Dan. You know about it?
Indeed I do. And if you do too, then I guess you know my plans for this evening...
Here you go. Do you have his sawn-off shotgun?
Greetings, Fox. I brought you an Exoskeleton, as we agreed...
Hi, Marked One. Hey, what's with the state of this suit? I expected it to be used, but not as bad as this! At least get it repaired before trying to give it to someone...
I'm sorry, I should have checked it. I'll get it repaired for you...
Hi, Bes. I found a suit for you. Reinforced, too...
Yes, it's certainly been reinforced, but it's been shot up... You don't expect me to wear it like this, do you?
Sorry, Bes. I'll get it fixed up for you...
Hi, Syak. I brought the SLOPE for you...
What the hell, Marked One? You don't give a friend something in this condition! At least get someone to check it out and repair it first...
I'm sorry. I hadn't realized. I'll get it fixed up for you...
Hi, Miser. Here's your Cobblestone suit...
Marked One, what the hell have you done with it? I know it has some negative properties, but this is just taking the piss! I trade in this stuff, so at least bring things to me in working order!
I'm sorry. I'll get it fixed for you...
Hi, Petruha! Here's your TOZ...
Are you serious? When I asked you for a weapon, I meant one in good condition! How do you expect me to keep myself alive with this?
I'm sorry, I didn't check it. I'll get it repaired for you...
Greetings, Yurek! Here you are!
Marked One! I'll always be grateful to you for saving my life, but I won't accept equipment in this condition from anyone. Not in the Zone...
I'm sorry, Yurek, this is my fault. I'll get it repaired for you...
Guide, I have a 'Thunderstorm' for you, as we agreed...
Marked One, I know you're new to this area, but do you not recognise the difference between a weapon that'll save your life and one that'll kill you when you use it?
I'm sorry. I should have got it checked out. I'll get it repaired for you...
Hey, Freeman! Here's your Desert Eagle...
What the hell, Marked One? Is this how you found it, or did you use it? If you did, then do me the courtesy of repairing something before returning it to its owner...
I'm sorry. I'll get it repaired for you...
General! I have your 'Bulldog'...
What kind of Stalker are you? I'd RTU any soldier who mistreated their weapon as badly as this. Get it repaired, properly, before showing your face in here again!
I'm very sorry. I have much to learn. I'll get it repaired...
Hi! Here's your amazing pistol!
Hi there, brother! Oh, what happened to it? Someone's wrecked it... Look, I can't accept it like this. Please get it fixed first, okay?
I'm sorry. I'll get it repaired for you...
Greetings, Miser! Here's your 'Bulldog'...

What the fuck, Stalker? Who are you trying to get killed? One of my guys, or me for selling it to them? This piece of crap is next to useless. Get it repaired, will you, and have them look at your own stuff while they're at it...
I'm sorry. I'll get it repaired...
Greetings, Dan! I met Raven, and here's your sawn-off...
And I see you've been field testing it... Look, be a good friend and have it repaired, will you?
Sorry, Dan I'm sorry. I'll get it repaired for you...
Greetings, Vein! I sorted everything with the Hunter... Here's your rifle!
Brother, I'm grateful for your effort, but I'm sure he didn't keep it in this condition. It's of no use to me unless it's working...
My fault, I should have noticed its condition. I'll get it repaired for you...
Hi there, Sid. Good to see you again!

Marked One! Good to see you too. I've been hearing how useful you've been around here since we first met. In return, I'd like to offer you some of my additional services, in terms of suit upgrades: I can have 'Pilot Night Vision' installed for you on certain types of armor - not the best I'm afraid, but whatever my 'suppliers' can get hold of around here...\n \nI can also have some of your armor reinforced, by spraying it with a light layer of particles from the 'Pellicle' artefact. This will give you better protection against certain elements, without feeling any difference. The treatment's not too expensive either. Well worth the money, I say!
Thank you, Sid. This is very much appreciated!
What suit upgrades can you do?

'Pilot Night Vision', but only one kind - Standard 'Green': The type I have can only be fitted to jackets and raincoats - and only if they're in good condition... I can also reinforce jackets using equipment developed by some techies I help out from time to time - you know, with vodka and other essential items...
 
Upgrade costs:
PNV = 10,000Ru
 
Jacket reinforcement:
 
Standard jackets = 5,000Ru
Modified jackets = 10,000Ru
Standard raincoat = 15,000Ru
Modified raincoat = 20,000Ru
 
Let me know if you're interested...
I'm interested in having Night Vision fitted...
Do you want it installed on a standard jacket, or a reinforced one?
Install it on my standard jacket...
Onto which jacket do you want Night Vision installed?
Install it on my standard jacket...
Install it on my dark raincoat...
Install it on my light raincoat...
Install it on my brown jacket...
Install it on my leather jacket...
Install it on my Bandit jacket...
Install it on my red Bandit jacket...
Install it on my black Bandit jacket...
Install it on my blue Bandit jacket...
Install it on my dark Bandit raincoat...
Install it on my brown Bandit raincoat...
Install it on my dark jacket...
Install it on my camouflage jacket...
Install it on my green jacket...
Install it on my dark camouflage jacket...
Install it on my light camouflage jacket...
Install it on my brown camouflage jacket...
Install it on my standard jacket with gas mask...
Install it on my Bandit jacket with gas mask...
Install it on my reinforced brown Bandit raincoat...
Install it on my reinforced jacket...
Install it on my reinforced Bandit jacket...
Install it on my reinforced dark Bandit raincoat...
Here, take your jacket. It's all set to go...

Here, take your reinforced dark Bandit raincoat. It's all set to go...
Reinforce it, please. These things are a bastard to keep repairing...
Reinforce a standard suit or one with PNV fitted?
Standard...
Which suit should I reinforce?
The standard jacket...

Hi Professor. I'm back...

Marked One, thank you for your help with our measurements. I'd like to return the favour by offering you our services in upgrading some of the protective suits we use - the Ecologist suit and the Ecologist 'Combat' suit. We've developed ways of reinforcing these suits, making them last longer. Consider it a long term investment. It's not cheap to start with, but it'll save you money in repairs and, sometimes, your life... Oh, and we also fit a variety of Pilot Night Vision devices to them...
